thumb.name: Always Lots to Talk About
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYak. yak. yak...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETammy.%3Cbr%3Ewe're Best Friends%3Cbr%3Ewho'll never%3Cbr%3Erun out of things%3Cbr%3Eto talk about!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: In My Thoughts Today
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EBobby.%3Cbr%3Efrom%3Cbr%3ERobby%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappiness is a butterfly. %3Cbr%3Ewhich when pursued%3Cbr%3Eis always just beyond %3Cbr%3Eyour grasp. but which. %3Cbr%3Eif you sit down quietly. %3Cbr%3Emay alight upon you. %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENathaniel Hawthorne %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI spent a quiet moment%3Cbr%3Ewith you today...%3Cbr%3Eyou're in so many%3Cbr%3Eof my fondest memories.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Longtime Best Friend
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe've been friends%3Cbr%3Efor so long.%3Cbr%3EDenise.%3Cbr%3Ethat I don't know%3Cbr%3Ewhat I'd ever do without you.%3Cbr%3EWe've been there for each other%3Cbr%3Eduring times of hurt%3Cbr%3Eand offered each other strength%3Cbr%3Eduring times of loss...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe've watched each other%3Cbr%3Echange and grow%3Cbr%3Ein so many different ways.%3Cbr%3Ecelebrating each other's accomplishments%3Cbr%3Eand supporting each other's dreams.%3Cbr%3EWe've laughed and talked.%3Cbr%3Eand confided in each other%3Cbr%3Ethe things we'd never dare to tell%3Cbr%3Eanyone else...%3Cbr%3EYou've been the best friend%3Cbr%3Eany person could be.%3Cbr%3Eand I hope you know in your heart%3Cbr%3Ehow much that friendship%3Cbr%3Emeans to me.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: The Coolest Friend Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EBecky.%3Cbr%3EOf all the friends%3Cbr%3E in the world...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're definitely the coolest!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: True-Blue Friend
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJan --%3Cbr%3Eyou're my spirit-lifting. %3Cbr%3Ejoy-bringing. gift-giving.%3Cbr%3Elove-sending. heart-mending.%3Cbr%3Eproblem-solving. laughter-sharing.%3Cbr%3Esoul-searching. story-telling.%3Cbr%3Efun-seeking...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...true-blue friend!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Thinking of Our Friendship
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJust to let you know. Stephanie...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...I'm thinking of you%3Cbr%3Eand the wonderful friendship we share.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Always an Adventure! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStay Tuned.%3Cbr%3E Alex...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...for more exciting adventures%3Cbr%3Eof the Alex and Morgan show!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBeing friends with you%3Cbr%3Eis always an adventure!%3Cbr%3E
